Description: Clay tablet; complete; letter; Old Babylonian.
Curator's comments: The case for this tablet is 1891,0509.2313.A (BM.82199,A).
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.286)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2000, Lisbon, 'A Escrita: Tracos e Espacos'
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
